content: Fixes a bug in the new Luau type solver that prevented inferring the types of globals.
Speeds up Studio startup by loading translations in parallel.
Improves script write performance for Class.EditableMesh by 20-40%.
Adds a visual editor for Class.AudioCompressor and Class.AudioLimiter instances.
Fixes bug of incorrect inertia data when using Class.PartOperation:SubstituteGeometry().
Fixes a crash when calling Class.Actor:BindToMessage() from the Command Bar in Studio.
Fixes an issue with Class.Sound.LoopRegion not working if the bounds of the loop region encompass the entire asset.
Fixes issue where switching macOS Studio app across monitors or changing resolution causes crashes.
Fixes issues with the mobile touch jump button on character death.

Users who register callbacks on Class.DragDetector|DragDetectors for Class.DragDetector.MouseHoverEnter and Class.DragDetector.MouseHoverLeave on touch devices will now only correctly see one set of calls to enter/leave when pressing and releasing (previously there were two sets of calls).
Fixes crashes related to custom clothing in the Avatar Setup preview.
Fixes an issue where Class.UIDragDetector did not take device insets into account.
When drawing in the Terrain Editor with "Ignore Parts" set to false, terrain will be added as expected.
In the "Next Gen Explorer" beta, fixes a rare failure of arrow key navigation/selection to jump to the correct item.
Adds support for en-150 English (Europe) locale.
Massively optimizes speed in the "Next Gen Explorer" beta when actively using the tool without clicking.
Instances in the "Next Gen Explorer" beta now always match the ordering of the current Explorer.
In the "Next Gen Explorer" beta, clearing the search now once again expands whatever your selection is, and it only expands the selection you made at time of clearing.
Fixes crashes in avatar compatibility plugin when a deep hierarchy is selected, or a hierarchy with invalid UTF8 strings.

Enables the Class.Workspace.FallHeightEnabled property to toggle the fallen height kill plane. Also fixes the kill plane logic so that models with at least one descendant fallen part or no descendant parts are deleted.
Fixes issues with Class.Highlight re-parenting on a Class.Model.
Fixes Studio ribbon buttons "Show Welds" and "Constraint Details" not being capable to toggle.
Suppresses errors about "exception while signaling: Cannot load the AnimationClipProvider Service" when interacting with streaming NPCs.
Class.Humanoid.Seated no longer passes a valid currentSeatPart as nil.
